title: Exit Through the Gift Shop
description:
Banksy's street art doc "Exit Through the Gift Shop" is the subject of this week's True Story, as Tig and Cheryl talk Disney cops, self-help books, and whether "Pranksy Banksy" is more attractive than Shepard Fairey. It's a hilarious episode with more twists and turns than a Mr. Brainwash art show! *this episode spills beans* Merch available at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
